name: 60 Seconds To Departure - An Angst 'Em Up! [GAME-JAM]
name_original: 60 Seconds To Departure - An Angst 'Em Up! [GAME-JAM]
description:
60 Seconds To Departure - An Angst 'Em Up! is a submission to the One Minute Game game jam. 

60 Seconds is a visual novel about Rory and Jennifer, two girls who have been online friends for years. They've just spent the last three weeks together in real life, meeting face-to-face for the first time. You play as Jennifer while Rory waits for her train to take her to the airport, Both girls seemingly have unfinished business.

However, you only have sixty real-life seconds until Rory's train leaves, whether you've come to a conclusion or not. 

Get your heart broken and ruin a relationship in this gay melodramatic Angst 'Em Up!

Credits:

- Art and Programming: Niandra

- Writing: StrayShellstone

Notes:

There may be some bugs or routes that end up going nowhere, because I was pretty busy and ended up putting a lot of the mechanical stuff together a few hours before the game finished. Although there's a lot of little things I would have done differently with more time, I'm really pleased with how this came out!
